Code: EXEC SQL SELECT VALUE(COUNT(DISTINCT T1.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO),0) FROM seguros.v0histsini T1, seguros.v0histsini T2 WHERE T2.COD_LOT_FENAL = :COD_LOT_FENAL AND T2.NUM_APOLICE = :NUM_APOLICE AND T2.cod_cobertura = :COD_COBERTURA AND T2.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO <> :NUM_APOL_SINISTRO AND T1.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO = T2.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO AND T1.OPERACAO IN (1001,1002,1003,1004,1009) AND T1.SITUACAO <> '2' AND T1.dtmovto <= :SIWBW001.W-DATA-PAGTO-ATE END SQL
